Constructor Detail

Game

public Game()
Instantiates a new game.

Method Detail

createPlayer

public boolean createPlayer(java.lang.String jid,
                            java.lang.String name)
Creates the player and a team every time two players without a team are available

Parameters:
jid - the XMPP-jid of the XMPPClient the player-object represents.
name - the name the nick name of the player
Returns:
true, if successful. false, if the player is already added or something went wrong.

playerReadyToPlay

public boolean playerReadyToPlay(Player player)
With this method the game becomes aware of the player that are ready to play. If all players have invoked this method the first round is started.

Parameters:
player - the player
Returns:
true, if successful

deletePlayer

public boolean deletePlayer(Player player,
                            java.lang.String reason)
Deletes a player, its team-mate and its team from the game and notifies the other players. If there are not enough teams left to go on with the game the game will be quited automatically and the remaining teams get the high-score.

Parameters:
player - the player
reason - the reason
Returns:
true, if successful

uncoverCard

public boolean uncoverCard()
Signalizes the Game that an card has been uncovered. The uncovered card is notified to all players to be shown. If it is the second one the actual round will be stopped and a new round begins.

Returns:
true, if successful

writeNetworkFingerprint

public boolean writeNetworkFingerprint(de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.xmpp.beans.locpairs.model.NetworkFingerPrint fingerprint)
Write network-fingerprint. It is used to persist the measured signal strengths to be analyzed later on.

Parameters:
fingerprint - the network-fingerprint
Returns:
true, if successful persisted.
